title: 2013/344/EU: Council Decision taken by common accord with the President of the Commission of 1 July 2013 appointing a Member of the European Commission
header:
2.7.2013 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 183/10
COUNCIL DECISION
taken by common accord with the President of the Commission
of 1 July 2013
appointing a Member of the European Commission
(2013/344/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Act of Accession of the Republic of Croatia, and in particular Article 21 thereof,
Having regard to the opinion of the European Parliament (1),
main_body: By common accord with Mr José Manuel DURÃO BARROSO, President of the Commission, the Council hereby appoints Mr Neven MIMICA as Member of the Commission for the period from 1 July 2013 to 31 October 2014.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 July 2013.
For the Council
The President
L. LINKEVIČIUS
(1)  Opinion of 12 June 2013 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
